text: ineziyani yamenutinina melikamochinimi yeserutini lenerisu kesirochachewi wenizochi yemifesubachewi genetochi yalwachewi mehonuni abisirachewi፡፡ keriswa kefire (‘ayineti) sisayini betemegebu k’ut’iri (firewochiwa silemimesaselu) «yihi ya ke’ahuni befiti yetegemebinewi newi» yilalu፡፡ irisunimi temesasayi hono teset’uti፡፡ lenesumi bewisit’wa nits’uhi yetederegu misitochi alwachewi፡፡ inesumi bewisit’wa zewitariwochi nachewi፡፡
